>
[Moonlit Chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2809)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 231 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=43)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_ has a collar adorned with stitched images of the phases of the moon. You can see in moonlight as though you had low-light vision. 

**Activate—Dim Sight** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You touch the stitched image of the new moon on the armor's collar and suppress the dazzled condition for 1 minute.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 33 gp of silver.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Moonlit Chain
